what: A Package With Some Helper Tools for Calculating Values for the What Works Clearinghouse (WWC)
title: A Package With Some Helper Tools for Calculating Values for the What Works Clearinghouse (WWC)
text: WWC R package aims provide useful helper functions education researchers aiming meet U.S. Department Education’s Institute Education Sciences’ Works Clearinghouse standards. package work progress, currently provides basic functions determining baseline equivalence quasi-experimental design (QED) studies use propensity score matching MatchIt R package. features planned added.

title: A Package With Some Helper Tools for Calculating Values for the What Works Clearinghouse (WWC)
text: can install development version wwc package GitHub :

text: psm Output MatchIt plot Logical. Whether include plot .

title: Calculate whether matched measures meet WWC standards for baseline equivalence — baseline_equivalence
text: data frame columns variable, type variable, equivalence measure value, whether baseline equivalence met, baseline equivalence measure used.

title: Calculate whether matched measures meet WWC standards for baseline equivalence — baseline_equivalence
code: library(MatchIt); library(magrittr); library(ggplot2); data("lalonde", package = "cobalt") m.out1 <- matchit(treat ~ age + educ + race + married + nodegree + re74 + re75, data = lalonde, method = "nearest") baseline_equiv <- baseline_equivalence(psm = m.out1)

title: Calculate Hedges' g for continuous measures — hedges_g
text: int_adj_mean intervention group's adjusted mean. comp_adj_mean comparison group's adjustment mean. n_int number observations intervention group. n_comp number observations comparison group. int_unadj_sd unadjusted standard deviation intervention group. comp_unadj_sd unadjusted standard deviation comparison group.
